timeline.message:
Fix JvmPauseMonitorTest#interruptOnStop test

Mockito was recently upgraded which includes a new feature that allows us to mock final methods and classes. I rewrote the test to be simpler using one of Mockito's Spy classes.

timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: org.mockito.Matchers is now deprecated, so I moved to the newer class
timeline.author: ZacBlanco
